about_the_game:
Guide your civilization to epic victory in Ephemeris, the upcoming turn-based space war strategy game with RTS style combat. Ephemeris draws inspiration from some of the genre’s classics like Master of Orion and Homeworld, and brings them together with some unique and new features, like physics-based combat and a randomly generated tech tree. The strategy side has been streamlined to minimise the need for micromanaging the details. Explore the huge galaxy and spread your civilization onto the planets – before anyone else does. Unlock new technologies, design your own spaceships and use diplomacy to reach your goals. If the peaceful approach fails, show them what your spaceships are made of and unleash your fleets upon the enemies! Ephemeris offers a unique and highly replayable gaming experience.

Unique space combat

The space combat in Ephemeris is in real time and fully three-dimensional. Huge size differences between the smallest fighters and the biggest battleships as well as the physically simulated movement give the combat a very distinct and cool look. Ships are designed by using parts unlocked from the technology tree. Choose hulls, shields, power sources, drives and weapons with different mounting types to design the ships your civilization needs.

Streamlined empire management

The turn-based strategy layer is designed to be fast paced but still have depth. With lots of automatic optimisation, you only have to worry about the most important parts of empire management. This keeps the game manageable even in the late stages and allows you to enjoy one playthrough from start to finish.

Randomly generated tech tree

The tech tree for one playthrough is randomly generated and common for all civilizations – players get to explore the hidden tech just like they explore the galaxy map. Players have to be ready for different approaches in galaxy exploration as well as in combat. This means that there is a lot of variation in the progression of the game between each playthrough, as you cannot always rely on your favourite strategy.

Labour of love

Ephemeris is a passion project started by a solo developer. If you have any questions or feedback or if you would like to express your support, our Discord server is the right place to share them. That’s where you’ll also find the news and updates about the project. Join our Discord today and get ready to command your own fleet!

Features:

  • Turn-based empire management
  • Explore a randomly generated galaxy
  • Fully 3D real-time space combat with simulated physics
  • Design ships using the technology discovered by your civilization
  • Different species with their own traits
  • Randomly generated tech tree ensures that each playthrough is fresh, new and vastly different.
  • Manage production of four different resources (food, minerals, research and credits)
  • Unique tools to effectively manage your empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit/Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060/AMD RX 480/Intel ARC A380
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit/Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600K/AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 TI/AMD RX5700/Intel ARC A580
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
